title: McNICHOLS Promotes Two Executives, Expanding Leadership Roles at North America’s Leading Supplier of Perforated Metal and Grating Products
text:
TAMPA, Fla.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- McNICHOLS Company, North America’s leading supplier of Perforated Metal , Expanded Metal , Wire Mesh , and Bar, Plank and Fiberglass Grating , is proud to announce two executive promotions within the organization.
Craig Stein earns his promotion to Senior Vice President and Chief Financial Officer from the dedication and hard work in his previous position of Vice President and Chief Financial Officer.
Stein began his journey with McNICHOLS as Vice President of Accounting and Finance in July, 2004. Stein proved his leadership abilities by initially managing these two business units, along with the Credit Services discipline, later earning the title of Chief Financial Officer. Today, Stein oversees numerous business functions including Human Resources, Recruiting, Learning and Development, Business Intelligence, Credit, Financial Accounting, Facilities and Information Services.
John Farley was named Senior Vice President and Chief Operating Officer, having held the title of Vice President and Chief Operating Officer.
Farley started with The Hole Team in 2005 as Vice President of Sales, responsible for all commercial sales and customer service. Showing his ability to consistently help the company grow top-line revenues and skills to lead district operations, Farley subsequently became Chief Operating Officer. He now directly leads resources at the senior level in Sales and Operations as well as all functions related to Supply, Integrated Business Planning, Logistics and Quality Assurance. Farley’s leadership has contributed to the company’s success and continues to be important as he encourages The Hole Team to remain focused on serving customers.
President Scott McNichols said, “I am blessed to serve directly with both Craig and John on a daily basis. These men have great character, consistently strive to improve and are passionate about The Hole Team and our amazing customers. They consistently model what it means to be Inspired to Serve®.”
McNICHOLS seeks to promote from within the company whenever possible and believes that The Hole Team makes the difference in the customer service experience. This historical practice continues to lead to lifelong careers for associates and satisfied customers.
McNICHOLS operates 19 metals service centers strategically placed coast-to-coast with a dedicated staff and communication network in place to serve customers nationwide. The company has the logistics network needed to provide fast, efficient and exceptional service. Family-owned and founded in 1952, McNICHOLS was established on Christian values, high ethical standards and a strong commitment to customer satisfaction. To learn more about McNICHOLS and The Hole Story®, please visit www.mcnichols.com .
